fixes.name: beans años de estudio
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR YearCount = 'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Años de estudio]
RETURN
IF(
    YearCount >= 1 && YearCount <= 5, "1-5",
    IF(
        YearCount >= 6 && YearCount <= 10, "6-10",
        IF(
            YearCount >= 11 && YearCount <= 20, "11-20",
            IF(
                YearCount >= 21 && YearCount <= 30, "21-30",
                BLANK()
            )
        )
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSEIF ranges into nested DAX IF expressions using a VAR for 'Años de estudio' for clarity. This is a calculated column because it performs row-level comparisons without any aggregation or parameters.
